## OrientedBox3.intersects() method

Checks intersection with the given `THREE.Frustum` or array of `THREE.Plane`<!-- -->s.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
intersects(frustumOrPlanes: Plane[] | Frustum): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  frustumOrPlanes | Plane\[\] \| Frustum | Frustum or array of planes. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
